messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/7/2002 9:01:26 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> For months we
> >took two cars everywhere we went.

I cannot do that... Hubby has his car when he goes out of town and soon since
it is a lease, we will only have one car which is a van actually.....
So, I will not be one of those lucky ones to have the luxury of 2 cars.....
People have to do what they have to do or whatever is in their means....
